message: so they wanted to partner with us to make a better gaming community on campus! I was waiting for our two year point to try and get SSF funds but this will be much more fantastic!

I'm so happy to announce that we have found a space on campus for our gaming lounge! This will be open weekly during Oak Street Textbook's business hours and will be equipped with consoles, sofas, a fridge and many many other perks!
here's a picture of the space under construction! http://a4.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/200790_1657959090467_1281810150_31512493_1235318_n.jpg
Oh, and the expected open date will be Fall of 2011
...what? :D
Oak Street is now buying and selling games
XD SO HAPPY SO EXCITED!
